kep.session package¶

Submodules¶

kep.session.commands module¶

Read YAML file with parsing or verification commands.

Used to read:
  • instructions.txt
  • checkpoints.txt
kep.session.commands.read_instructions_for_checkpoints(source: str)¶
kep.session.commands.read_instructions_for_headers(source: str)¶

Read parsing command blocks from source. Return:

list of blocks, each block is a list of tuples

kep.session.dataframes module¶

kep.session.dataframes.unpack_dataframes(datapoints)¶

Return a tuple of annual, quarterly, monthly pandas dataframes.

kep.session.session module¶

Extract data from CSV file using parsing instructions.

class kep.session.session.Session(base_units_source: str, commands_source: str)¶
Базовые классы: object
get_parsed_tables(csv_source)¶

Extract data csv_source.

labels()¶

Return list of labels from parsed tables.

datapoints()¶

Return a list of values from parsed tables.

dataframes()¶

Return a tuple of annual, quarterly and monthly dataframes from parsed tables.

verify()¶

kep.session.to_excel module¶

Save xls file.

kep.session.to_excel.save_excel(filepath, dataframes)¶

Save dataframes .xlsx filepath.

kep.session.verifier module¶

kep.session.verifier.all(self, strings)¶

Require all values from strings, raise exception otherwise.

kep.session.verifier.any(self, strings)¶

Require at least one value from strings, raise exception otherwise.

kep.session.verifier.datapoints(self)¶

Values in parsed tables.

Return:
list of Datapoint instances
kep.session.verifier.to_datapoint(string: str)¶
kep.session.verifier.as_datapoints(strings: list)¶
kep.session.verifier.subset(x, datapoints)¶
kep.session.verifier.require_all(strings, datapoints)¶
kep.session.verifier.require_any(strings, datapoints)¶
